title: Forever101
author: Forever101
created_time: October 07, 2023, 02:25:57 PMLast edit: October 10, 2023, 10:58:14 PM by Forever101
content: Jobs for our country here sucks , just imagine person comot for house as early as 6 A.M go work and e comot for work by 4pm enter road, meet traffic congestion, come reach house by 6pm. Does it really worth it with The minimum wage of 30k naira. This working system no dey favour our country piple. Na still same thing with company work. Some work self no get  resting day , from Sunday to another Sunday. Abi na like this e be for other countries?. No wonder many person like dey self employed. Me I believe say among those of us wey dey here fit hold political office tomorrow, abeg make we reason this matter.Added: If you are offered 20million naira to start a business or to take a government job that pays 30k monthly, which one will you opt in for considering the economy situation of this country. Let's see your opinion regarding this cause we do see a lot of people craving for government work. We have also seen people been sick for not been employed as government worker. If there is no opportunity to get the offer of 20million naira, would you rather take a loan to start a business or continue waiting for government work Give reasons to your answer and the benefits attached to it.

comments.body: Omor, watin you talk nah true and I side am, those kind of jobs no dey good at all because I done see to couples way dey brawl because of day either the woman or the mand on of them dey come back home late from work.This nah something way even the management of the place way person dey work supposed to consider for the help of their workers, like for other countries, I believe say some of those gobs for there get day and night workers and they no dey too start early because for some places nai evening and night nai be there morning, so them fit open by 10 o'clock am then night workers come by 4 o'clock pm and that there side a lot of roads dey way go make them reach there vicinity early.This traffic matter nah watin government supposed to put in other for this we country, more especially for states way get a lot of populations like the Lagos state, so that pipo no go dey suffocate for traffic.

comments.author: Broadanbig
comments.body: OP no be small talk be this. The minimum wage compared to the job and economy too na heavy suffer head o. Man go wake up very early in the morning go work after the kitikata go come back late in most cases come meet economy wahala for house too. E no easy o. Na all these things dey make person dey feel say education na scam and waste of time. Person go spend good number of years for school finish with high expectations only to come out come jam wahala. As it stands now the current minimum wage Na rubbish because e no go reach anywhere at all. People dey really go through lots now and only those who get skills now Na Dem dey enjoy am dat is why e good make man learn extra skills aside going to school because Na that one fit put food for table now.Being self employed is a good one because that would make you be the boss of your own while you do your business. This can only be achieved when you have the available capital and skills to start such business. Although there are investors out there looking for where to invest their funds and if luck being by your side, they find your business worth the money, they invest into it and your business will grow coupled with their connection they would unleash for your business so they could make profit from it. Self employed is not a bad idea because you will have time for yourself, family and all other things you find worthy of your time. You will also be an employer of labour too.

Many sef dey receive salary wey dey below official minimum wage. For Naija now, POS business better pass plenty white collar jobs. 6am-4pm jobs na no no for me.

comments.author: Hewlet
comments.body: Quote from: Forever101 on October 07, 2023, 02:25:57 PMJobs for our country here sucks , just imagine person comot for house as early as 6 A.M go work and e comot for work by 4pm enter road, meet traffic congestion, come reach house by 6pm. Does it really worth it with The minimum wage of 30k naira.  It's not everyone who goes to work by 6 a.m. and comes back by 6 p.m. that is paid 30k. Some earn a very reasonable amount that doesn't even give them a thought about the amount of time worked.Understand that being self-employed doesn't mean that you will have lesser working hours. As a matter of fact, if you're self-employed or even working from home, you will need a high working hours because your earning is 100% a function of your input which deals a lot with how much time you put into your work.

comments.author: DubemIfedigbo001
comments.body: If you arrive at office by 6am and leave by 4pm, na better work you dey do naa, some employees in private firms especially POS terminals dey arrive 6am, and leave their work by 7:30pm, come go their Oga house use another 1hr balance account with better queries from their Oga. That kind person fit dey reach house by 9pm and the worst be say some of them even work on Sundays and their salaries aren't up to 15k monthly.  Sincerely, everything about job nature needs a  boost in Nigeria. People are in major slavery, just to survive because they can't stay idle and they receive little or no proper appreciation for their work. Government jobs are even slightly better cos they observe public holidays and skip weekends. Most private offices don't. In fact, I've worked in an organization that I come to work on Sundays and most times its very unplanned, like CEO just calls and fixes a meeting with you as soon as you're back from church.The economy is very bad currently and that's the root of the problem, of we can get the economy back to what it was in 2015 or better, the 30k minimum wage is a big money cos then dollar was #150. Earning 30k then meant $200. Purchasing power was higher and people  were more comfortable. I honestly think the solution now isn't to increase the pay, if not we might reach the condition of Zimbabwe which has 2 million worth of its currency as a single denomination. The economy needs a major boost and things will normalize. The price of things keeps increasing and with increased salaries, you'll still find yourself not satisfied with your pay. The government has really failed us in this country.

comments.body: Quote from: Forever101 on October 07, 2023, 02:25:57 PMJobs for our country here sucks , just imagine person comot for house as early as 6 A.M go work and e comot for work by 4pm enter road, meet traffic congestion, come reach house by 6pm. Me I believe say among those of us wey dey here fit hold political office tomorrow, abeg make we reason this matter.Yes, the job system in our country is very bad, especially where we have to work long hours but pay less. I work in a company where I have too work from 7am to 4am with hard work. But the salary is accordingly very low at only 34k naira, where all the money to cover the expenses of self and family runs out at the end of the month. The rest day is Sunday to Sunday, during which there is some time to do homework. However, such a situation may not exist in other countries, but this problem is seen the most in our country. So we believe that the political leaders who will be in office later, should Abeg play the highest role on this issue, and we want to give the highest argument on this issue.
